ComicInfo.Title: Mars Attacks!; The Closet
ComicInfo.Summary:
Mars Attacks!: Morgana and Teezy meet Fawn, a native nearly human female. The three of them fight the fury of the Martian climate.
The Closet: Little Susie Ingalls is attacked in her bedroom by boogey men and fake parents. She is saved and whisked to safety by the Black Flame as her parents and their house are apparently destroyed by fire.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Tom Sutton,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Tom Sutton
ComicInfo.Inker: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson
ComicInfo.Colorist: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson
ComicInfo.Letterer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Janice Chiang,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Janice Chiang
